ygData.subject: Re: Changes to blacksmithing in patch
ygData.msgSnippet: HEHE interesting change since last time I tried making scalers I kept getting large lid container MOLDS...now you get a FILE??!! LOL I think they still need to
ygData.messageBody:
HEHE interesting change since last time I tried making scalers I kept
getting large lid container MOLDS...now you get a FILE??!! LOL I think they
still need to work on that bug!! ;)

Twilite

At 01:59 PM 6/8/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: Peanut <peanut@...>
>
>
>I have experienced one change since the patch. When making scalars, you
>will get a file even if you fail. If you succeed, you get the mold and a
>file.
>
>-Peanut
